data.system_settings: ASUS Zenfone max pro m1 Android 8.1.0
data.actual_result: The track bar resets back to 0:00 making it seem like you're playing the song from the beginning
data.expected_result: The songs trackbar should not reset and should continue according to the song
data.short_description: Spotify track bar resets after exiting and entering dicord
data.steps_to_repro: - Play a song on Spotify and wait for discord to detect it - Exit discord a wait a few seconds - Re enter discord
